data.prayer: Please, teach the 38 believers in Jubbada Hoose, Somalia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jubbada Hoose, Somalia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: There are 267,000 people living in the state of Jubbada Hoose. Only about 38 might be believers.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7026 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Jubbada Hoose, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, help the 38 believers in Jubbada Hoose to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mushunguli people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, teach the 38 believers in Jubbada Hoose that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Jubbada Hoose.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Jubbada Hoose, Somalia has a population of 267,000.

We estimate Jubbada Hoose has 38 people who might know Jesus, 763 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 266,199 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7,026 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Jubbada Hoose an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.
